downloadDescription: his training guide introduces you to the tasks you may be asked to perform as Global admins, Search admins, or Search editors in support of Microsoft Search.
detailsSection:
This training guide introduces you to the tasks you may be asked to perform as Global admins, Search admins, or Search editors in support of Microsoft Search.

We introduce the Search & intelligence admin center and some basic administrative tasks, like provisioning users and managing roles in lessons 1 and 2. These topics are covered here primarily for the benefit of new admins.
installInstructionSection: To install this download, save the file to a directory on your computer. Important: After you save the file, open the downloaded .pdf. To remove this download, delete the file from the directory where you saved it.
